text:
@GregAbbott_TX More COVID-19 cases appeared after you opened the State. RGV Cameron County. So now you have put everybody in jeopardy again. 2 of those cases were travel related.
I am asthmatic and very concerned for my own health and welfare EVEN IF YOU ARE NOT. SHUT IT DOWN.
